src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( cafe ) ) ; request ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ; G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) ARI : At 11 AM . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) [start] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] ARI : How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Where are the toilets ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Right or left ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )

src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( name ( ari ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : I 'd like to have a little coffee before seeing the doctor . # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) RP : Ah yes , that 's a good idea , so we 'll ... # acknowledge ( ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) LC : Is there a cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : Ok , perfect . # acknowledge ( ) @ CG ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : We 'll be able to have a coffee or something else . Does that suit you ? @ AG ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) LC : Yes . # affirm ( ) @ CG ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) RP : We 'll go slowly , we have time anyway . LC : Do you have to have coffee at the cafe ? [start] ARI : No . [MASK] LC : Ok. We 'll go straight to the counter . [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] RP : Let 's go then . LC : We 'll ask for coffee . LC : Yes , yes . [MASK] LC : We 're going to go see the doctor . LC : Are there many people waiting in radiology ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Ok , it 's clear . [MASK] RP : So maybe we 'll go through the reception area again ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes , ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : We 're going to ask him how to get there . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : Now I 'm a little bit lost , I do n't know which corridor we came from . [MASK] LC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] [MASK] RP : And which corridor to take to get to the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : I may have to go to the toilet before . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Where are the toilets , please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : I 'll let you go to the toilet , I 'll wait for you . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Perfect , let 's go then . LC : Ok . RP : Ok , we 'll take it slowly , we 'll get there . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : So we can ask where the counter is to get a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] LC : Umm ... Where exactly do you go for a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : We 'll ask him again . RP : Umm ... We 're looking for the cafeteria . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Yes well thank you . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : However , he was n't able to tell us if there was a special counter for coffees , it does n't matter .

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Yes , I do . I have to go and see someone who 's hospitalised and I ca n't remember the ward . It 's room 17 . Can you please tell me where it is ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . # inform ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I ca n't remember the appointment time . Could you tell me ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . [MASK] [end] RC : Thank you , bye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day . # bye ( )

You have to go to the reception . # cant-help ( ) ; suggest ( going-to ( reception ) ) LP : Ok , thank you . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . # cant-help ( ) ; call-nurse ( ) ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Um , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : I 'm hard of hearing and the sound is a little low , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : So , another question ... [end] LC : Um , hello . src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .
